title: Tivo SaaS Template
body:
‘Tivo’ is a free HTML SaaS Landing Page template built by[ Inovatik](https://inovatik.com/). Inovatik have a variety of free & premium templates which are well worth checking out! Tivo is designed for SaaS apps looking to maximize conversions. Features include sticky header navigation with links that scroll seamlessly to page sections. As well as a clean services overview and lightbox feature carousal, video modal, pricing table, testimonial slider and working forms for service sign up, log in as well as a newsletter sign up.

Check out the [live demo](https://inovatik.com/tivo-landing-page/index.html)!

![Tivo SaaS Template](/images/uploads/tivo.jpg)
